title: Fun fact; exercise is good for mental health.
body:
Mental health is related to your ability to react to situations. When you exercise you are "stretching" your nervous system, allowing for a more active, alert you that can react with better decision making. It also means you're less likely to react poorly to losses, on top of the aforementioned decision making that makes you less likely to lose in the first place.

Plus you weebs kinda need to see the sun.
